• But jobs are back now, with an emphasis toward local entry-level, service, and trade work
• Jobs are available only to those 18 and older, and must meet Facebook’s guidelines

items.title: Microsoft AI announces first image generator created in-house
bullets: • MAI-Image-1 is Microsoft's first text-to-image generator, designed and developed in-house
• The model has already secured a spot in the top 10 of LMArena, the AI benchmark site
• Microsoft says it sought feedback from creative professionals to avoid “repetitive or generically-stylized outputs”

items.title: Tesla Cybertruck sales are flatlining
bullets: • Tesla only sold 5,385 Cybertrucks in the third quarter, down 63 percent compared to the same period in 2024, when the automaker delivered over 14,000
• Tesla is now expected to deliver around 20,000 Cybertruck this year, a steep drop from the estimated 50,000 in 2024

items.title: California enacts its own internet age-gating law
bullets: • California joins a growing group of states with a new internet age-gating law
• The law mandates that device operating systems and app stores require users to enter their age or date of birth when setting up a new phone or computer
• The new rules are slated to take effect on January 1st, 2027

items.title: EcoFlow’s Delta Pro Ultra X can power a home for weeks

• Battery capacity scales from 12kWh up to a massive 180kWh
